Docs.summary: Extension methods for the MapKit.MKErrorCode enumeration.

remarks.para: The extension method for the MapKit.MKErrorCode enumeration can be used to fetch the error domain associated with these error codes.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Foundation.NSString GetDomain (this MapKit.MKErrorCode self);

Docs.summary: Returns the error domain associated with the MapKit.MKErrorCode value

remarks.para: See the for information on how to use the error domains when reporting errors.
